channel.title: How To on Mark Gingrass Blog
channel.description: Recent content in How To on Mark Gingrass Blog

item.title: Hyundai Elantra 2010 Back Seat Removal How To Tutorial
item.description: [embed]https://youtu.be/P0XLd-aWJGM[/embed] Hyundai Elantra 2010 Back Seat Removal How To Tutorial. Remove backseat to install covers or just to replace them completely. As you can tell, this one needed a replacement BAD. You only need one size ratchet or a skateboard tool. Takes about 10 minutes to remove entire back seat bottom and tops.

item.title: Five Minute GitHub Tutorial with RStudio - Simple!
item.description: What is a GitHub? Recently, I went to search for a few jobs in the tech industry and one thing stood out with each of the sites I visited. Everyone was asking “What’s your GitHub address?” Admittedly, I didn’t have one until just the other day. I posted this short five minute tutorial to get you started early! GitHub is a repository for version control hosting of coding projects and much more.

item.title: Wheelchair using a car bike rack allowing 5 passengers along with trunk room in tact.
item.description: [embed]https://youtu.be/fUY7hh42DOA?list=PL0oBhq0tLsOBxiq5q__xcWV5WOqS9HGe3[/embed] How to use a bicycle rack (Saris brand) to hold a wheel chair for a T-4/T-5 Complete Paraplegic. David Gingrass demonstrates how to transfer into passenger seat of car. Car will not hold 5 passengers and keep the trunk room. Bike rack.
